func.title: StopRumble

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose controller should stop rumbling. Can be NO_OWNER to make all controllers stop.

func.remark: In 9.0 OC the global function was deprecated, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and StopRumble.
func.desc: Stops a rumble effect that was started with PlayRumble. Returns true if the given player is valid; there is no way to know whether there was actually a playing rumble effect.
